Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Watson, no run, short and skiddy on off, chopped behind to the keeper
Mohammad Amir to Watson, no run, short and cuts back in, Watson camps back and manages an inside edge onto the pad
Mohammad Amir to Watson, no run, similar ball, Watson has no room to free his arms, chopped now to backward point
Mohammad Amir to Watson, 1 run, short on middle, no swing, turned gently in front of short midwicket for one
Mohammad Amir to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, dug in short and holds its line outside off, guided to third man for one
Mohammad Amir to Watson, no run, much shorter and Amir hammers the deck outside off, angled towards backward point
Sohail Tanvir to Sharjeel Khan, no run, no swing either for Tanvir, at least for the first ball. Pitched up on off, pushed to mid-off
Sohail Tanvir to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, full and on middle and leg, Tanvir still hasn't corrected his line. Clipped through midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Watson, 1 run, Watson hangs back and helps this one to third man
Sohail Tanvir to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, full and curls in, tapped wide of backward point
Sohail Tanvir to Watson, no run, shorter and outside off, Watson wants to crash it away, but only skewers it to mid-off. He inspects the bottom of his bat
Sohail Tanvir to Watson, no run, another leg-stump ball, tickled straight to short fine leg. Watson sends Sharjeel back
Mohammad Amir to Sharjeel Khan, 1 leg bye, Amir slants it into the pads, diverted behind square leg off the pad
Mohammad Amir to Watson, SIX, straight back of a length ball, Watson gets his bearings right. He clears his left leg and unleashes a clean swing, sending the ball over midwicket over a six
Mohammad Amir to Watson, 2 runs, pitched up on off, eased through the covers
Mohammad Amir to Watson, 1 run, short of a length on off, he keeps back and chops towards backward point
Mohammad Amir to Sharjeel Khan, no run, short and Amir raps the thigh as Sharjeel cant connect with a flick. The tracker shows that the ball would have climbed over the stumps
Mohammad Amir to Sharjeel Khan, 2 runs, picked away off the hips to fine leg
Sohail Tanvir to Watson, 1 run, back of a length on off, dabbed with soft hands towards point for one
Sohail Tanvir to Sharjeel Khan, 3 runs, width outside off, Sharjeel frees his arms and carves it over extra-cover
Sohail Tanvir to Watson, 1 run, wicket-to-wicket line, turned through square leg
Sohail Tanvir to Sharjeel Khan, no run, shortish and down leg, may have brushed something on its way to the keeper
Sohail Tanvir to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, short of a length on middle, right in the pulling arc. Sharjeel rocks back and hits firmly over midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, full and wide outside off, slapped up and over cover for four

Imad Wasim to Watson, OUT, and he strikes right away! Arm-ball skids off the surface and arrows in to hit the back pad. IPL's new millionaire was neither forward nor back. Watson is trapped in front. He pays the penalty for playing for the turn
Wicket: ['SR Watson lbw b Imad Wasim 13 (14b 0x4 1x6) SR: 92.85']

Commentary: Imad Wasim to Khalid Latif, no run, another arm-ball, kept out
Imad Wasim to Khalid Latif, FOUR, pushed through down leg, Latif does not connect with a flick. The ball brushes the pad and wanders fine on the leg side. Given as runs, though
Imad Wasim to Khalid Latif, no run, pushed through and comes in, defended
Imad Wasim to Khalid Latif, SIX, take that! Imad tosses this up on middle, Latif charges down the track and lifts it over long-off for a six
Imad Wasim to Khalid Latif, 1 run, full and straight, nudged through midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, Latif steps out and welcomes Malik with a lofted hit over the covers
Shoaib Malik to Khalid Latif, no run, slides on flat and quick, poked towards cover
Shoaib Malik to Khalid Latif, 1 run, turned towards square leg
Shoaib Malik to Sharjeel Khan, FOUR, dropped short and outside off, Sharjeel skips back and cracks it through the covers for four
Shoaib Malik to Sharjeel Khan, no run, hurrying ball on middle, blocked to the off side on the back foot
Shoaib Malik to Sharjeel Khan, no run, flat and quick at 90ks, Sharjeel blocks again
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, no run, length and outside off, pushed to point
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, no run, extra bounce in the channel, drifts in from wide of the crease. Left alone belatedly
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, 1 run, shorter in length now, pulled over backward square leg
Shakib Al Hasan to Sharjeel Khan, no run, looped up on middle, bunted defensively towards mid-off
Shakib Al Hasan to Sharjeel Khan, no run, darted full, jammed to the right of the bowler
Shakib Al Hasan to Sharjeel Khan, no run, another blockhole ball, jabbed to the left of Shakib
Bopara to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, floaty full toss outside off, shovelled to long-on. The fielder in the deep (Simmons) dives to his left to stop the ball
Bopara to Khalid Latif, no run, back of a length, patted towards point
Bopara to Khalid Latif, 1 run, 97.6ks slower ball, knocked to midwicket on the back foot
Bopara to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, Bopara ventures wide of the crease and angles it in, clipped through midwicket
Bopara to Khalid Latif, no run, short and outside off, Latif misses out on a scoring opportunity. Cut straight to point
Bopara to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, shorter on the stumps, pulled to deep midwicket
Shakib Al Hasan to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, flat on middle, wristy drive to long-off
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, 1 run, flighted on off, straight ball, tapped to long-off with a straightish bat
Shakib Al Hasan to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, low full toss, Sharjeel flits around in the crease and drives to long-off
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, no run, looped up and drifts in, defended to cover. Latif looks for a scampered single, but is sent back
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, SIX, bang! Latif steps out, meets this on a half-volley. He gets under it and launches it over cow corner
Shakib Al Hasan to Khalid Latif, 1 run, round-arm ball slid outside off, swatted through midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Khalid Latif, no run, sliding across off, blocked to cover. Sharjeel drifts out in search for a single but Simmons fails to throw the stumps down at the non-striker's end
Shoaib Malik to Khalid Latif, no run, darted on the leg stump, flicked straight to short fine leg
Shoaib Malik to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, Latif goes deep in the crease and secures a couple through square leg. Excellent running
Shoaib Malik to Khalid Latif, 1 run, clipped in front of square again. Latif has to settle with one
Shoaib Malik to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, short on off, Sharjeel stands tall and punches it through the covers
Shoaib Malik to Khalid Latif, no run, slides on the off stump, Latif can only block it back to Malik
Usama Mir to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, starts off with a short ball, which is pulled to deep midwicket on the back foot
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, 1 run, half-tracker outside off, lashed to sweeper cover
Usama Mir to Sharjeel Khan, no run, this one skids off the surface and hits the thigh as Sharjeel misses the sweep
Usama Mir to Sharjeel Khan, 2 runs, dragged short again, this should have been nailed away. Instead, Sharjeel pulls to the left of deep midwicket
Usama Mir to Sharjeel Khan, 1 run, legbreak, turns in. Slog-swept backward of square on the leg side
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, no run, chopped from outside off to short third man
Mohammad Amir to Sharjeel Khan, no run, short and tucks up the batsman for room. Dropped defensively onto the pitch

Mohammad Amir to Sharjeel Khan, OUT, and Amir comes back and breaks it! This wasn't a threatening ball, however. Short and wide outside off, Sharjeel swings his hands through a pull. Wasim sprints in and hangs on to a low catch at deep midwicket
Mohammad Amir to Ashar Zaidi, 1 run, pitched up and outside off, nice flowy drive through cover
Wicket: ['Sharjeel Khan c Imad Wasim b Mohammad Amir 28 (27b 3x4 0x6) SR: 103.70']

Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Khalid Latif, 1 run, angled in on off from round the wicket, snuck in a bit as well. Jammed to the off side
Mohammad Amir to Ashar Zaidi, 1 run, full and ducks in again, squirted to the midwicket off an inside edge
Mohammad Amir to Khalid Latif, no run, short and wide outside off, swing and a miss
Usama Mir to Ashar Zaidi, 1 run, full and on middle, he steps out and clips through midwicket
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, full and outside off, shovelled past cover with loads of bottom hand
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, 1 run, short legbreak outside off, cut to backward point on the back foot
Usama Mir to Ashar Zaidi, no run, Mir has a googly up his sleeve. Rips away outside off with extra bounce and dupes the batsman
Usama Mir to Ashar Zaidi, 1 run, glanced off the pads to Vince at short fine leg. The keeper collects the throw and takes the bails off in a flash, but Latif was in
Usama Mir to Khalid Latif, 2 runs, cracked away through point
Bopara to Ashar Zaidi, no run, Zaidi uses his feet, Bopara floats it just outside leg. Not a wide
Bopara to Ashar Zaidi, no run, Bopara beats the flick and hits the pad. Impact outside off
Bopara to Ashar Zaidi, 1 run, wide line outside off, Zaidi reaches out and squeezes it towards point
Bopara to Khalid Latif, 1 run, length and cuts in, worked through midwicket
Bopara to Ashar Zaidi, 1 run, length and outside off, heaved to cow corner off the inside half

Bopara to Khalid Latif, OUT, another of these floaty slower ones outside off, Latif wants to force it away. But the ball goes only as fat as the bowler. Good awareness from Bopara. He collects the ball, turns back, and produces an over-arm throw to catch Zaidi short; he had strayed from the crease at the non-strikers end
Usama Mir to Russell, no run, full and outside off, drive and a miss
Usama Mir to Russell, no run, another quick legbreak, Russell is beaten again. He cant connect with a cut
Usama Mir to Russell, no run, another rushing ball, kept out
Usama Mir to Russell, 2 runs, whipped off the pads through midwicket
Usama Mir to Russell, no run, back of a length and on fired on off, pushed towards point
Usama Mir to Russell, OUT, Mir sets off on a celebratory run! He hangs this one in the air, it stops and dips on Russell. He shapes to drive but chips a return catch. Two in two overs for Karachi
Bopara to Khalid Latif, OUT, Make that three wickets in eight balls. The middle stump is tilted back. Seam-up yorker, Latif is late to jab his bat down. He hears the death rattle
Bopara to Billings, FOUR, low full toss outside off, Billings uses his feet. He is on the move as he squirts it to third man with an open face

Bopara to Billings, OUT, Islamabad crumble further. Four wickets in 10 balls. Billings dances out and is on the move again. He pushes it to point and sets off for a speedy single, Misbah isn't interested; Billings is sent back. Vince lets rip a direct hit and runs his England mate out
Wicket: ['AD Russell c & b Usama Mir 2 (6b 0x4 0x6) SR: 33.33']

Commentary: Bopara to Imran Khalid, 1 run, full and outside off, square-driven to point. They pinch a single off an overthrow
Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, back of a length, Misbah stands tall, punches through covers and gets off the mark
Bopara to Imran Khalid, no run, full and cuts back in to hit the pad as Khalid messes up a flick
Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, no run, Tanvir goes wide of the crease and angles it in, quietly blocked back
Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full and swerves in, clipped through midwicket
Sohail Tanvir to Imran Khalid, 1 run, just wide of the diving backward point fielder. The batsman attempts a leg-side flick and plops it in the air via a leading edge
Sohail Tanvir to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, full and curls in with the angle, squirted in front of square on the leg side for one
Sohail Tanvir to Imran Khalid, no run, length ball on off, pushed to cover
Sohail Tanvir to Imran Khalid, 1 run, full and outside off, smoothly driven to deep point
Bopara to Imran Khalid, no run, slower ball from Bopara, comes from the back of the hand and catches the pad as the batsman plays all around it
Bopara to Imran Khalid, SIX, back of a length and outside off, swiped over midwicket for a six.Khalid went deep in the crease and manufactured his own pace. Crowd catch. He claims a share to $100,000
Bopara to Imran Khalid, 1 run, full and 113ks, squeezed to backward point
Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, 1 run, back of a length on off, heaved to deep midwicket
Bopara to Imran Khalid, 1 run, slower short ball, swung away to deep square leg

Bopara to Misbah-ul-Haq, OUT, Shakib runs in from long-on, keeps his eyes on the ball, and snaffles the catch! Bopara sucks pace off this ball as well. Misbah goes down on one knee. Misbah goes down. Swung into the hands of Shakib
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Sami, 1 run, back of a length on off, pushed to cover, straight to Imad Wasim. A direct hit could have dismissed Sami at the non-striker's end
Sohail Tanvir to Imran Khalid, 1 run, short, slower ball outside off. The batsman makes room and carves it over point
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Sami, FOUR, Tanvir ventures wide of the crease and sends down an incoming yorker, french-cut behind square leg for four
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Sami, no run, impressive slower ball outside off, Sami does not wait for the ball to arrive. Flay and a miss
Sohail Tanvir to Mohammad Sami, 1 run, full toss angled down leg, helped to long leg
Sohail Tanvir to Imran Khalid, no run, another slower ball from Tanvir, foxes the advancing Khalid
Wicket: ['Misbah-ul-Haq c Shakib Al Hasan b Bopara 4 (6b 0x4 0x6) SR: 66.66']

Commentary: Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Sami, FOUR, full and outside off, Sami drills it to the long-off fence
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Sami, 1 run, yorker on middle, squirted through cover

Mohammad Amir to Imran Khalid, OUT, Khalid backs away outside leg, Amir follows him with a yorker. Khalid misses it, but scampers across for a bye. The keeper, though, was pretty alert, he picked the ball up quickly and ferries it to Amir who hits the stumps with an over-arm throw
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Sami, SIX, length ball on middle, Sami stands and drills it down the ground again. This time he comfortably clears long-off
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Sami, no run, bouncer down leg, Sami shapes to hook before belatedly ducking his head out of the way
Mohammad Amir to Mohammad Sami, 3 runs, back of a length and outside off, slogged in front of the on-rushing deep midwicket fielder. Bopara fumbles and Sami gets three
